game.title: The Quest for the Golden Coin
game.objective: Catalogue and retrieve three ancient artifacts to unlock the treasure map.
game.description: In your quest, locate the Temple of Wisdom in the center of the city, the Serpent's Den in the mountains, and the Sunken Grotto by the lake. Uncover their secrets and obtain the artifacts to proceed.
game.reward: Three golden coins and a mysterious amulet

task.objective: Obtain Ancient Scroll at Temple of Wisdom
task.description: Search the library for an encrypted scroll containing the first artifact's location.
Face off with the guardian serpent to claim the second artifact in the depths of the den.
Examine the underwater ruins to locate and access the grotto.

task.objective: Collect Ancient Treasures in Treasure Chamber
task.description: Successfully navigate the traps and retrieve all three artifacts inside the chamber to complete the quest.
